data.actual_result: When you join the server you can see the hidden channels name along with the “load more messages” button that's infinitely pressable.
data.expected_result: You should join the server and only see the channels you have permission to see.
data.short_description: When accepting an invite to a channel that you don't have permission to view the load messages button is visible and won't go away until clicking on another channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a discord server you manage. -Create a new text channel. - Make it so everyone cannot read or send messages. - Create a invite link to that channel. - On a new account accept the invite link.
